description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. CastleMiner Z is an online coop survival horror game in a block based environment. Travel as your Avatar with your friends in a huge, ever-changing world and craft modern weapons to defend yourself from dragons and the zombie horde! If you enjoy the survival aspects of games like Minecraft, then find out why CastleMiner Z is the best selling Xbox Indie Game of all time. Castle Miner Zombie Dragon
